languages.text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).
languages.original_text: Если персонаж наносит цели {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, заставляя ее переместиться, он также наносит ей (от 1 до 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} дополнительно за каждую клетку, на которую цель перемещена за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонажа. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник: дополнительный варп-урон увеличивается до (от 1 до 6).

traits.locale_text: If the wielder deals damage, their enemies suffer 1-3 warp damage (with armour penetration of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wielder's turn. Hereticus — Adherent: the enemies suffer 1-6 warp damage instead.

If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

languages.text: Если персонаж наносит цели {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, заставляя ее переместиться, он также наносит ей (от 1 до 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} дополнительно за каждую клетку, на которую цель перемещена за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} персонажа. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник: дополнительный варп-урон увеличивается до (от 1 до 6).

Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo y lo obliga a moverse, el enemigo sufre (de 1 a 3) de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} adicional por cada casilla que ha sido desplazado durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario: el daño de disformidad adicional aumenta a (de 1 a 6).
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

traits.locale_text: Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo y lo obliga a moverse, el enemigo sufre (de 1 a 3) de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} adicional por cada casilla que ha sido desplazado durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario: el daño de disformidad adicional aumenta a (de 1 a 6).

languages.text: 如果装备者对敌人造成了{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，且强制目标敌人移动，则该敌人在装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中每移动1格，就会受到1-3点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者：改为额外造成1-6点亚空间伤害。
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者对敌人造成了{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，且强制目标敌人移动，则该敌人在装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中每移动1格，就会受到1-3点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者：改为额外造成1-6点亚空间伤害。

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige à sa cible des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qui la forcent à se déplacer, celle-ci subit (de 1 à 3) points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} supplémentaires pour chaque case ainsi parcourue lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan : les dégâts du Warp supplémentaires sont compris entre (1 et 6).
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige à sa cible des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qui la forcent à se déplacer, celle-ci subit (de 1 à 3) points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} supplémentaires pour chaque case ainsi parcourue lors du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan : les dégâts du Warp supplémentaires sont compris entre (1 et 6).

languages.text: Fügt der Träger einem Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, der ihn zwingt, sich zu bewegen, erleidet dieser Gegner für jedes Feld, das es sich während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers bewegt, (1 bis 3) zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} — Anhänger: Der zusätzliche Warp-Schaden erhöht sich auf (1 bis 6).
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

traits.locale_text: Fügt der Träger einem Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu, der ihn zwingt, sich zu bewegen, erleidet dieser Gegner für jedes Feld, das es sich während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Trägers bewegt, (1 bis 3) zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Anhänger: Der zusätzliche Warp-Schaden erhöht sich auf (1 bis 6).

languages.text: 使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、その敵を移動させた場合、敵は使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中、移動させられたセル1つにつき（1～3）の追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}を負う。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 門下生：追加歪みダメージが（1～6）増加する。
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、その敵を移動させた場合、敵は使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中、移動させられたセル1つにつき（1～3）の追加{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}を負う。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 門下生：追加ワープダメージが（1～6）増加する。

languages.text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemy and enemy has moved by wearer's abilities, this enemy suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they has been moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to enemy and enemy has moved by wearer's abilities, this enemy suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they has been moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

languages.text: Giyen kişi, bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verirse o düşmanı hareket etmeye zorlar ve düşman, giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında katettiği her hücre için (1 ila 3) ilave {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarına{/g} maruz kalır. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Taraftar: İlave öteboyut hasarı (1 ila 6) puana yükselir.
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an enemy, forcing that enemy to move, this enemy suffers (from 1 to 3) additional {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} for each cell they were moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the additional warp damage is increased to (from 1 to 6).
